席に着く: (せきにつく) - to sit on a seat
席を取って置く: (せきをとっておく) - to book (take) a seat
席を外す: (せきをはずす) - to leave one's seat; to temporarily excuse oneself (from a meeting, etc.); to step outside; to be away (from one's desk, etc.)
席を立つ: (せきをたつ) - to leave one's seat
席を設ける: (せきをもうける) - to give a banquet

席を蹴る: (せきをける) - to stomp out (of a room, etc.); to storm out
席入り: (せきいり) - entering a tea room
席取り: (せきとり) - taking (extra) seats/holding a seat (for a friend, etc.); reserving a seat
席巻: (せっけん) - sweeping conquest; sweeping over; conquering; invading

席画: (せきが) - impromptu drawing composed at a gathering
帯: (tai/o/obi) - sash , obi; paper wrapper on books, CDs, etc.; band, belt, strip
帯く: (はく) - (usu 履く or 穿く) to put on (or wear) lower-body clothing (i.e. pants, skirt, etc.)/to put on (or wear) footwear; (usu. 佩く or 帯く) to affix a sword to one's hip; to affix a bowstring to a bow
帯に短し襷に長し: (おびにみじかしたすきにながし) - neither one thing nor the other; too short for a belt, too long for a sleeve tie
帯びる: (おびる) - to wear (sword, decoration, etc.)/to carry; to be entrusted (e.g. with a mission)/to take on; to have a trace of/to be tinged with
帯を締める: (おびをしめる) - do up a sash
帯グラフ: (おびグラフ) - bar graph; rectangular graph
帯ドラマ: (おびドラマ) - radio or television serial broadcast in the same time slot each day or week

帯出: (たいしゅつ) - taking out; using at home

帯分数: (たいぶんすう) - mixed fraction; compound number
帯剣: (たいけん) - wearing a sword; being armed with a sword; sword

帰する: (きする) - to come to (in the end)/to end in; to attribute/to blame
帰ってくる: (かえってくる) - to return; to come back
帰って来る: (かえってくる) - to return; to come back
帰らぬ人: (かえらぬひと) - dead person; deceased person
帰りがけ: (かえりがけ) - on the way back; when about to go back
帰りしな: (かえりしな) - when about to go back; on the way back/on the way home
帰りなんいざ: (かえりなんいざ) - Come away home! (expression suggesting quitting one's job and moving back to one's hometown)
帰り掛け: (かえりがけ) - on the way back; when about to go back
帰り支度: (かえりじたく) - preparations for returning (home)
帰り着く: (かえりつく) - to arrive home; to return
帰り花: (かえりばな) - second blooming (in a season)/reflowering/reflorescence; return to working by a prostitute, kabuki actor, etc.
帰り路: (かえりみち) - the way back or home; return trip
帰り道: (かえりみち) - the way back or home; return trip
